newsitem.title: CZECH REPUBLIC: Czech BICS100 bond index rises 0.117pts to 100.107.
newsitem.headline: Czech BICS100 bond index rises 0.117pts to 100.107.

text.p: The BICS 100 index measuring the Czech Republic's most liquid bonds rose 0.117 points in Friday's trading to 100.107, bank Ceska Sporitelna said.
It said the duration of the index portfolio fell 0.003 points to 2.353 years.

The BICSG 100 index, which Ceska Sporitelna calculates using only government bonds, rose 0.069 points to 96.117, the bank said, while the duration of the index portfolio shortened by 0.003 points to 2.379 years.
It said the yield index YBICS 1000 fell 4.646 points to 1,170.986.
